author: Raven Darkfur
comment: Some improvements have been made since my last review, but now the notification count has been permanently disabled, sad because I found that really useful!

author: Keith Ritchie
comment: its elegant and simple. Just a beautiful and changeable face for any color scheme of clothing.  Awesome!!!

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Thank you Keith!

author: Jason Kowalski
comment: very cool looking. has a bunch of colors to choose from

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Thank you Jason!

comment: Great color options and rad minimalistic vibe

author: D Checkley
comment: Removed all but one complication. Dick move. Uninstalled.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi, if you already have premium, all complications are available! Be sure your watch is synched with phone and internet is available!

author: Oleg Vetuh
comment: Please remove notification count, it used to be perfect

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Oleg, notification counter removed! It was a request made by several people.. Update your app to apply! Thank you..

author: Garrett Rodriguez
comment: *Update 2* Back to my favorite/perfect watch face!  The features that were changed and removed have been added back with this latest update. The developer was very fast and in responding to my email regarding my feedback on the last update. They were very courteous and informative with their plans on addressing mine and other users concerns in the next update. I am very happy to have this watch face back and with added features. Very simplistic and beautiful. I highly recommend this this watch face. I would also recommend emailing the developer if you are having any questions or concerns. They were awesome communicating. :)   *Older Versions* "Was" in love this watch face. But now when the watch goes into AOD, It loses any color/stays in only black and white. I have tried rebooting phone, watch, re-syncing from the Android Wear app, Uninstalling from both the phone and watch, clearing cache on both also, and a mix and match of those thing. Still, keep going back to black and white. Asus Zenwatch 3 - Wear 2.0.  *Older Versions* *UPDATE/REPLY" So the way the AOD on the watch performed before this update was not intentional and was purposely changed? I know that is supposed to be the benefits of AOD on an AMOLED screen, but did you change it because this was a guideline or a requirement? If it was just a base/optimal guideline, would or could you at least leave it how you have it now as Google wishes/but give users who want that option the ability to toggle it on? If not, do you have a repo where I could find the previous version of the Wear app to allow me to revert back? Of course I know this wouldn't be a supported version for you, but I did purchase this app that I loved, then it was half taken away from me without even a warning :(.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content:
Hi Garrett, the screen goes in protection mode in AOD to avoid screen damaging and battery drain, according to Google Wear guidelines. 
In last update we have introduced the "always-on screen" option (active by default) to get neon visible in AOD also! Update the app to enjoy this new feature!

author: Chris Collins
comment: How do you change the time to 12 hours from 24 military time? At 12 it shows 0 for hour.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Chris, noon/midnight time it's now fixed. Update your app! Thank you

author: okizen
comment: Beautiful and elegant neon watchfaces with great colours.Simple and uncluttered. Highly recommended

author: Jason Khan
comment: It would be nice to have an option to turn off the notification counter. I liked the minimal approach of the old version.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content:
Hi Jason, you're right, it would be nice to chose to show notifications or not.
Maybe we'll implement this feature in next release.. thanks for your feedback!

comment: Loved it but not happy with the new release. The digital display won't fit on one line.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi, digital display was restored in one line in last release .. Update your watchface app to apply this feature!

author: Zach Otano
comment: App just updated and now the digital face looks weird and I do not like it anymore.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Zach, previous digital face was restored. You can update the app to apply it. Hope we like you... Thanks for your opinion!

comment: doesn't let you set correct time format

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi, it get default time format from watch/phone! In last update noon/midnight time was fixed. Update your app! Thank you

author: Clash Gamer
comment: Baaaad

I love this watch face for its colours and the clarity of the complications you can add. Battery readings for both watch and phone are particularly useful. I have also never seen a real-time compass being offered on any other watch face. Congratulations to the developer!

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Thank you so much dom!

author: John Taylor
comment: Misleading. All the customisation, except colour, is in the premium version only. Yet screenshots make it look like you can add widgets from the free version. Had I known, I would not have wasted my time installing. Uninstalling it now.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi John, we have added Complications and, in free version, you can now add one widget at your choice!

author: sagar dham
comment: I am using fossil q marshal watch with android wear 2.0 i installed the app both side and purchased premium version. After purchase its showing all option of premium setting on my phone but when i tried to change options on my watch everytime i am getting message "enable premium settings on phone and there is no option available". Waste of money and time plz dont buy..i did everything force closing the app on my phone and restarting my watch but no fix

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi sagar, major update released!  The ability to enable premium features (and also the check on purchase) was moved directly on the watch. We also added Complications for Android Wear 2.0.. Hope we like you! Thanks for your feedback

author: Dariel Crespo
comment: Dev responded to my issue of watch face not showing and fixed the issue. Love the blue glow and purchased the premium for the extra goodies. Very pleased!

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Dariel,  we have update the app and now is also available for wear 2!

author: Paul Dempsey
comment: Installed paid version on my watch and it just keeps uninstalling waste of money

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content:
Hi Paul, we have released a major update, completly rewritten, with many bug fixed, and introduced Complications for Wear 2.0
Update the app, we hope your problems are solved, now! Thanks for your feedback

author: mark edmonds
comment: Great app works perfectly on my z2 and smartwatch 3

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Thank you mark! We have also added new features for Wear 2.0!

author: Placid Cardoz
comment: Awesome watch face.... Any plans to include a weather widget?

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Placid, we have implemented Complications for Wear 2.0 with weather widget and many more! Update the app to enjoy all the widgets available! Thanks for your feedback

author: Johnny Lipovac
comment: Plain and simple

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Johnny, we are happy that you like it! Thank you!

author: Rage Lorenz
comment: Luv it

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Thank you Rage! New features added, update the app to enjoy them!

author: Alvester Garnett
comment: I love that this face looks like it could be in the movie 'Tron'. It's ultra modern and stylish at the same time. I'm looking forward to playing with the new complications it's just now offering.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Alvester, new Complications for Wear 2.0 are now available! Update your app! Thank you for your feedback!

author: Dave Allchurch
comment: Gives a neon futuristic look to the watch. I love the acid colour. Sometimes less is more and with this watch face it certainly delivers this look. Great job

author: Raouf Abdullah
comment: Very cool.. most of the colors look very nice on my watch LG Urban

author: hector c
comment: Didn't work on my lg urbane

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi Hector,  we have update the app and now is also available for wear 2!

author: Kai L
comment: Less is more

author: Brian Molony
comment: Great looking face.

Really like the free version. The Analog looks great. I decided to buy the premium settings and was a little disappointed.( I was really hoping the date had an option to be less long (just include day number) when on analog.)  It also seems before you buy that there are a lot of customization, but there is very little. I really wish there was support for Android 2.0 complications on this. That would make premium more than worth it for $0.99.  I do still REALLY like the watchface and think it is one of the best looking analog faces. I just wish they had invested more time into the premium version.   If this was updated with complications, then I would HIGHLY recommend the premium version. As of now, I'd stick with the free version if you like the analog.

reply.author: paulserver.com
reply.content: Hi, good news: we have introduced Complications for Android 2.0! Update the app to enjoy this new feature! Thanks for your feedback, we really appreciate it!
